name: Fusion Crush: Hero Orbs
description:
Fusion Crush

The casual fusion game: challenge your friends or join them and face challenges together! Unique orbs with unique powers. Choose your ultimate lineup to crush the waves of enemies before they take a life.

Fun and Easy
Addictively simple, Fusion Crush is a fast-paced game where every enemy you defeat is sent to your opponent. Just tap and get started.

Strategies and Combos
Different fusions with different combos. Pick the perfect line-up to crush your opponent and always be on the lookout for potential counters.


PVP and Co-op
Experience Fusion Crush in new ways through the different game modes. Crush your opponent with your fusion combos. Work with your teammate to come up with the ultimate line-up in Co-op or test your luck as you draft-pick your dice in Arena.
